name: Dice! Rice! Roll!
description:
Let's make sushi! Dice, rice and roll as much sushi as you can in 90 seconds. 

  • Programming: Christopher Poole & Andrew Kurano
  • 3D Modeling & Animation: Andrew Kurano
  • Images: Andrew Kurano & Various CC0 Assets
  • Voice Acting: Andrew Kurano
  • SFX: Various CC0 Assets
  • Music: Alexander Nakarada (https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/)
